page.title: Properties Panes
page.introduction: The bottom right pane of the VCell document window contains an Object Properties tab that displays properties of any entity (e.g. species, reaction, structure) selected in the main View Pane of the document window.
page.operations:
Properties are specific to the item selected. The different properties displayed include:
Structures
Molecules
Species Properties
Observables Properties
Reactions
Membrane Flux
Reaction Rules Editor
Reaction Rules Kinetics
Stoichiometry
Parameters
Pathway Information
Problems
